alert.note: Alert for La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:04PM EDT until August 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... St. Joseph County in north central Indiana... Northeastern Starke County in northwestern Indiana... Northwestern Marshall County in north central Indiana... Northeastern La Porte County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/. * At 404 PM EDT/304 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Buffalo to near La Crosse, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... South Bend, Mishawaka, Georgetown, Gulivoire Park, Granger, Walkerton, North Liberty, New Carlisle, Kingsford Heights, Hamlet, Lakeville, Roseland, Koontz Lake, La Paz, Kingsbury, Indian Village, Teegarden, Salem Heights, Fish Lake and Chain-o-lakes. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 56 and 82. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke
